channel.title: Dailies on Opinionated Guides
channel.description: Recent content in Dailies on Opinionated Guides

item.description: Day x # Writing Prompt # After months of endless false accusations of being a witch, a perfectly fine young woman is determined to become a witch. u/MostlyMades “Witch! Witch! What just because I wear fucking dark clothes, like growing herbs, have had pre-marital sex, and don’t like their silly little Sunday sing along hour doesn’t mean I’m a God damned witch” “Mm,” Abbey tried to speak, as sala dripped off her tortilla chip onto the table “I dunno Bree, I think you had to have done something magical when you made this,” she held up her chip, making even more sala drip off “devine tomato based dip”

Day x # Writing Prompt # After months of endless false accusations of being a witch, a perfectly fine young woman is determined to become a witch. u/MostlyMades Art # Featured Artwork # My Work # Photography # Music # What I’m listening to # What I’m making # Gaming # Code & Software # Featured Project # What I’m working on # Watching # Reading # test2 Today’s Poem # Today’s Thoughts #
